text.headline: Alexandros Chionidis — Life & Career
text.text: Explore key milestones across education and work experience.

text.headline: 🎓 BSc Informatics & Telecommunications
text.text: Completed coursework and thesis at the University of Athens, focusing on software engineering and data systems.

text.headline: 🛍️ Store Manager — Retail (Ekali)
text.text: Led operations, customer service, and sales strategy for a local retail business in Ekali, Athens.

text.headline: 🚀 Data Engineer — Netcompany-Intrasoft
text.text: Designed and implemented big data pipelines using Spark and Scala for large-scale analytics on-premise.

text.headline: 🚀 Data Engineer — Waymore
text.text: Built and led a real-time data platform using Spark, Kafka, and GCP; improved processing speed and system scalability.

text.headline: 📘 Snowflake Data Engineering Specialization
text.text: Completed via Coursera. Focused on advanced data engineering techniques using Snowflake.

text.headline: 📘 Google Advanced Data Analytics Specialization
text.text: Completed via Coursera. Covered advanced data analysis, statistics, and ML fundamentals.

text.headline: 📘 Google Data Analytics Specialization
text.text: Completed via Coursera. Developed skills in SQL, data visualization, and project-based analysis.

text.headline: 📘 Modern Big Data Analysis with SQL
text.text: Completed via Coursera by Cloudera. Focused on using SQL in big data environments.

text.headline: 📘 Pedagogical and Teaching Competence
text.text: Certified by University of Athens. Training in education theory and classroom methodologies.

text.headline: 📘 GCP Professional Data Engineer — In Progress
text.text: Currently studying for the Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer certification. Focused on designing, building, and managing scalable data infrastructure on GCP.
